import React from 'react' import Cover from "../../img/cover.jpg" import Profile from "../../img/profileImg.jpg" import "./ProfileCard.css" import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' const ProfileCard = () => { const {user} = useSelector((state)=>state) const ProfilePage = false return (
Nihal Status
200 Followings
10 Followings
{ProfilePage && ( <>
5 Posts
)}
{ ProfilePage ? "" : My Profile }
) } export default ProfileCard
